data.comment: The match has started at SchücoArena.
Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
In the minute 2, Throw-in high up the field for B. Munich in Bielefeld.
In Bielefeld Bielefeld drive forward through Mike Van der Hoorn. His shot is on target but it's saved.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
In the minute 8, Bielefeld to take a throw-in in B. Munich territory.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Thomas Muller.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Bielefeld.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Bielefeld goal kick.
Corentin Tolisso (B. Munich) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in their own half.
In the minute 15, Thomas Muller gets his shot on target but fails to score for B. Munich.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
Ball safe as Bielefeld is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
B. Munich have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 20, In Bielefeld a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Thomas Muller for the away team is judged to be offside.
B. Munich's Thomas Muller breaks free at SchücoArena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 23, Bielefeld awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
Daniel Siebert awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! Robert Lewandowski extends B. Munich's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 25, Leon Goretzka instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in Bielefeld.
In the minute 29, Robert Lewandowski (B. Munich) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Bielefeld defenders.
Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
Christian Gebauer (Bielefeld) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 31, Bielefeld's Fabian Klos is on target but unsuccessful.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Bielefeld.
B. Munich have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Ritsu Doan for Bielefeld drives towards goal at SchücoArena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
B. Munich's Corentin Tolisso gets in a shot on goal at SchücoArena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
In the minute 35, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
B. Munich attack but Robert Lewandowski's header doesn't find the target.
Daniel Siebert awards Bielefeld a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Daniel Siebert signals a throw-in for Bielefeld, close to B. Munich's area.
Goal kick for B. Munich at SchücoArena.
Bielefeld needs to be cautious. B. Munich have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the home team in Bielefeld.
Daniel Siebert signals a Bielefeld throw-in in B. Munich's half.
Daniel Siebert blows against B. Munich's Thomas Muller for offside.
In the minute 41, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fabian Klos of Bielefeld is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 44, Ritsu Doan of Bielefeld smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at SchücoArena.
Goal! Robert Lewandowski extends B. Munich's lead to 0-3.
Great play from Thomas Muller to set up the goal.
The second-half has started.
Throw-in B. Munich.
In the minute 47, Bielefeld pushes forward through Christian Gebauer, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
Mike Van der Hoorn (Bielefeld) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bielefeld.
Bielefeld awarded a free kick in their own half.
Great shot from B. Munich's Robert Lewandowski but he is denied by the crossbar.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to B. Munich.
It's now 0-4 in Bielefeld as Thomas Muller scores for B. Munich.
That's a fine assist from Robert Lewandowski.
In the minute 52, Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to Bielefeld in their own half.
Daniel Siebert awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Bielefeld goal kick.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Bielefeld in their own half.
Daniel Siebert awards B. Munich a goal kick.
Daniel Siebert signals a Bielefeld throw-in in B. Munich's half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Bielefeld in the half of B. Munich.
Can B. Munich capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bielefeld's half?
Bielefeld awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 57, Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bielefeld's half?
In the minute 58, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
Goal! Ritsu Doan pulls one back to make it 1-4.
Fabian Klos with an assist there.
Throw-in for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
Ball safe as Bielefeld is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in B. Munich.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Bielefeld territory.
B. Munich's Kingsley Coman gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 63, Bielefeld have a goal kick.
Free kick Bielefeld.
Bielefeld are caught offside.
In the minute 65, Bielefeld to take a throw-in in B. Munich territory.
The away team have replaced Serge Gnabry with Douglas Costa. This is the first substitution made today by Hans-Dieter Flick.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for B. Munich close to the penalty box.
Hans-Dieter Flick (B. Munich) is making a second substitution, with Javi Martinez replacing Leon Goretzka.
Goal kick for Bielefeld at SchücoArena.
Can Bielefeld get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
Bielefeld are coming forward and Ritsu Doan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 70, Bielefeld have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Christian Gebauer with Reinhold Yabo.
Uwe Neuhaus is making the team's second substitution at SchücoArena with Sven Schipplock replacing Fabian Kunze.
In Bielefeld Bielefeld attack through Sven Schipplock. The finish is off target, however.
Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
In the minute 71, B. Munich needs to be cautious. Bielefeld have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
Ball safe as Bielefeld is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Bielefeld in the half of B. Munich.
Throw-in for Bielefeld in their own half.
Daniel Siebert signals a free kick to B. Munich.
In the minute 73, Nathan De Medina (Bielefeld) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for B. Munich close to the penalty box.
B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Bielefeld are in shooting range from this free kick.
At SchücoArena, Corentin Tolisso is shown a red card and sent off.
Corner awarded to Bielefeld.
In the minute 79, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Daniel Siebert.
Javi Martinez (B. Munich) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Bielefeld have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Bielefeld's Sven Schipplock is whistled for offside at SchücoArena.
